#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
typedef vector<int> vi;
typedef pair<int,int> pii;
typedef pair<ll,ll> pll;
typedef vector<pii> vpii;
typedef unsigned long long llu;

#define debug(x) cerr<<#x<<" "<<x<<endl;
#define f first
#define s second
#define mp make_pair
#define pb push_back
int n,k;
long long memo[1<<16][17];
long long recurse(int mask,int last_used)
{ bool checker=false;
    if(memo[mask][last_used]!=-1)
        return memo[mask][last_used];
       else
    {  long long ans=0;
        for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
        {
            if((mask&(1<<i))==0) // this bit is not set in the mask
            {    checker=true;
                if(abs(i-last_used)<=k||last_used==0)
                ans+=recurse((mask|(1<<i)),i);
            }
        }
        if(!checker)
           ans=1;
        memo[mask][last_used]=ans;
        //else
    }
    return memo[mask][last_used];
}
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {   memset(memo,-1,sizeof(memo));
     scanf("%d %d",&n,&k);
        printf("%lld\n",recurse(0,0));
    }
    return 0;
}
